attributes.action: Stop farmers rights to kill dogs on farmland
attributes.additional_details: Upon the recent media attention to the law which permits farmers to kill dogs if they are a threat to livestock, I propose the government changes this law with immediate effect to reverse the current law. Uncountable numbers of pet dogs are brutally and inhumanity shot/killed every year by farmers. This needs to stop now. Make it a criminal offence for farmers to kill dogs.
